entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING ENDED, Sharbot Lake

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
